pr_title: DDF-5757 Fix the DefinitionParser-generated required attributes metacard validators

timeline.message: DDF-5757 Fix the DefinitionParser-generated required attributes metacard validators

timeline.bodyHTML:
✏️ Good opportunity to refactor this whole thing:

  List<Callable<Boolean>> registerMetacardValidator(
      final BundleContext context,
      final Changeset changeset,
      final Entry<String, List<MetacardValidatorDefinition>> row) {
    return getMetacardValidators(row.getKey(), row.getValue().get(0))
        .stream()
        .map(
            metacardValidator -> {
              try {
                return (Callable<Boolean>)
                    () -> {
                      ServiceRegistration<MetacardValidator> registration =
                          context.registerService(MetacardValidator.class, metacardValidator, null);
                      changeset.metacardValidatorServices.add(registration);
                      return registration != null;
                    };
              } catch (IllegalStateException ise) {
                LOGGER.error(
                    "Could not register metacard validator for definition: {} {}",
                    row.getKey(),
                    row.getValue(),
                    ise);
              }

              return (Callable<Boolean>) () -> Boolean.FALSE;
            })
        .collect(Collectors.toList());
  }

  private List<Callable<Boolean>> registerMetacardValidators(
      Changeset changeset,
      List<Map<String, List<MetacardValidatorDefinition>>> metacardValidatorDefinitions) {
    Function<Entry<String, List<MetacardValidatorDefinition>>, List<Callable<Boolean>>>
        validatorRegistration =
            row -> registerMetacardValidator(getBundleContext(), changeset, row);

    return metacardValidatorDefinitions
        .stream()
        .map(Map::entrySet)
        .flatMap(Set::stream)
        .map(validatorRegistration)
        .flatMap(List::stream)
        .collect(Collectors.toList());
  }
timeline.author: leo-sakh
